content: cloud gate ii is based on cloud gate we wanted a slightly closer knit version with less volume but still with a light and airy feel the result is a smaller size use a bulky brushed mohair and be sure to catch the core of the yarn with your needle tip to avoid dropped stitches in the store many knitters are excited to see this pattern because they ve stashed mohair and don t know what to do with it here s the answer and because it s knit loosely yardage requirements are low the grey mohair for the model was dyed with dharma acid dye color 446 silver grey in a vegetable steamer
